entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. High 9.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or periods of drizzle. Fog becoming fog patches overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
